languages.text: Слуги Вольного Торговца стравливают знать, что выливается в кровавую междоусобицу. Итог — израненная противостоянием колония и триумф самого беспринципного дома, вырвавшего победу чередой омерзительных предательств и низменного шантажа.

The Rogue Trader's servants set the nobles against each other, starting a bloody feud. In the end, the colony is left scarred by the conflict and under the rule of the most unscrupulous noble house, which secured its victory through a series of despicable betrayals and blackmail.
languages.original_text: Слуги Вольного Торговца стравливают знать, что выливается в кровавую междоусобицу. Итог — израненная противостоянием колония и триумф самого беспринципного дома, вырвавшего победу чередой омерзительных предательств и низменного шантажа.

traits.locale_text: The Rogue Trader's servants set the nobles against each other, starting a bloody feud. In the end, the colony is left gutted and under the rule of the most unscrupulous noble house that has secured its victory through a series of despicable betrayals and blackmail.
The spies track down several embezzlers among the governor's entourage — they find themselves on the chopping block alongside the head of the colony.

The Rogue Trader's servants set the nobles against each other, starting a bloody feud. In the end, the colony is left scarred by the conflict and under the rule of the most unscrupulous noble house, which secured its victory through a series of despicable betrayals and blackmail.

The Rogue Trader's servants set the nobles against each other, starting a bloody feud. In the end, the colony is left scarred by the conflict and under the rule of the most unscrupulous noble house, which secured its victory through a series of despicable betrayals and blackmail.

The Rogue Trader's servants set the nobles against each other, starting a bloody feud. In the end, the colony is left scarred by the conflict and under the rule of the most unscrupulous noble house, which secured its victory through a series of despicable betrayals and blackmail.

languages.text: Les serviteurs {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} montent les aristocrates les uns contre les autres, attisant ainsi les braises d'une sanglante rivalité. Au bout du compte, la colonie meurtrie par les violences est livrée aux mains de la noble maison la moins scrupuleuse, dont la victoire résulte d'une longue série de trahisons et de chantages odieux.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's servants set the nobles against each other, starting a bloody feud. In the end, the colony is left scarred by the conflict and under the rule of the most unscrupulous noble house, which secured its victory through a series of despicable betrayals and blackmail.

traits.locale_text: Les serviteurs {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} montent les aristocrates les uns contre les autres, attisant ainsi les braises d'une sanglante rivalité. Au bout du compte, la colonie meurtrie par les violences est livrée aux mains de la noble maison la moins scrupuleuse, dont la victoire résulte d'une longue série de trahisons et de chantages odieux.

languages.text: 自由開拓者の従者たちは貴族たちを対立させ、血なまぐさい抗争を引き起こした。最終的にコロニーは争いの傷跡を残し、卑劣な裏切りや恐喝を繰り返して勝利を確保した、最も悪辣な貴族の支配下に置かれた。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's servants set the nobles against each other, starting a bloody feud. In the end, the colony is left scarred by the conflict and under the rule of the most unscrupulous noble house, which secured its victory through a series of despicable betrayals and blackmail.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者の従者たちは貴族たちを対立させ、血なまぐさい抗争を引き起こした。最終的にコロニーは争いの傷跡を残し、卑劣な裏切りや恐喝を繰り返して勝利を確保した、最も悪辣な貴族の支配下に置かれた。

languages.text: 行商浪人的仆人煽动众多贵族自相残杀，一场由仇恨驱使的血战开始了。到了最后，殖民地在冲突中伤痕累累，而最为肆无忌惮的贵族家族赢得了最终的胜利。他们依靠一系列卑鄙的背叛与勒索，成为了笑到最后的人。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's servants set the nobles against each other, starting a bloody feud. In the end, the colony is left scarred by the conflict and under the rule of the most unscrupulous noble house, which secured its victory through a series of despicable betrayals and blackmail.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人的仆人煽动众多贵族自相残杀，一场由仇恨驱使的血战开始了。到了最后，殖民地在冲突中伤痕累累，而最为肆无忌惮的贵族家族赢得了最终的胜利。他们依靠一系列卑鄙的背叛与勒索，成为了笑到最后的人。

languages.text: Los sirvientes de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente vuelven a los nobles unos contra otros, dando lugar a un sangriento conflicto. Al final, la colonia queda marcada por el conflicto y dominada por la casa con menos escrúpulos, que ha asegurado su dominio mediante traiciones y chantajes.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's servants set the nobles against each other, starting a bloody feud. In the end, the colony is left scarred by the conflict and under the rule of the most unscrupulous noble house, which secured its victory through a series of despicable betrayals and blackmail.

traits.locale_text: Los sirvientes de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente vuelven a los nobles unos contra otros, dando lugar a un sangriento conflicto. Al final, la colonia queda marcada por el conflicto y dominada por la casa con menos escrúpulos, que ha asegurado su dominio mediante traiciones y chantajes.

languages.text: Die Diener {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} hetzen die Adligen gegeneinander auf und starten eine blutige Fehde. Am Ende ist die Kolonie von dem Konflikt schwer gezeichnet und steht unter der Herrschaft des skrupellosesten Adelshauses überhaupt, das sich durch schändlichen Verrat und skrupellose Erpressung den Sieg gesichert hat.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's servants set the nobles against each other, starting a bloody feud. In the end, the colony is left scarred by the conflict and under the rule of the most unscrupulous noble house, which secured its victory through a series of despicable betrayals and blackmail.

languages.text: Hür Tacir'in hizmetkârları, soyluları birbirine düşürerek kanlı bir husumet başlatıyor. Sonunda koloni bu kavgadan derin yaralar alırken yönetim de zaferini bir dizi alçakça ihanet ve şantajla elde eden en ahlaksız soylu hanenin eline geçiyor.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's servants set the nobles against each other, starting a bloody feud. In the end, the colony is left scarred by the conflict and under the rule of the most unscrupulous noble house, which secured its victory through a series of despicable betrayals and blackmail.
